ai.summary: Cheddleton 1 is a short, easy 2.6 km hike in the UK, suitable for beginners and families. The route offers a gentle walk with minimal technical challenge and pleasant surroundings.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail consists of well-maintained footpaths with mostly gentle gradients. Surfaces are typically compacted earth or gravel, with short grassy sections. In wet conditions expect mud and slippery patches.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for daylight and weather; wear sturdy footwear; stay on marked paths; be prepared for uneven ground and mud; mind gates and stiles; keep dogs under control where allowed; carry water and a small first aid kit; tell someone your plans and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Layered clothing and a waterproof jacket
Map or offline navigation device (or smartphone with offline maps)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; can be done year-round with appropriate clothing and caution in winter.

seo.title: Cheddleton 1: Easy 2.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Cheddleton 1, a short and easy 2.6 km hike in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families, featuring gentle terrain and scenic surroundings.
